room_title: Escape room "Meltdown" by Escape Virtuality in New York
room_description: The city is in danger and you need to stop a nuclear reactor from entering into a meltdown. Time is of the essence so there is no room for error. This quick escape room is housed behind glass walls so people from the street or from inside will be able to see you play. Meltdown is a skill-based game that has random hints so no two experiences are exactly alike. Can you save the city from a MELTDOWN?
